title: Chocolate chip and coffee cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter', '300g caster sugar', '225g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons instant espresso coffee powder', '225g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '250g porridge oats', '225g salted peanuts', '225g milk chocolate chips', '40g desiccated coconut']
